body: @LettuceZ cause the Japanese would find it better if the mc was a fucking beta 🤣🤣🤣
The Animation is different because of the company who animated it

Fully agreed LettuceZ. The NTR shit was annoying. I wish they had animated the parts where he steals both back and gets another for his Harem when they fall back in love with him. Plus his turn switch makes the rapists look like saints in comparison. Lol

Why the actual fuck did the hentai change the story from a nigga with a bad mouth and a harem into an ntr with a beta mc? I'm genuinely curious cuz the two stories are so different  that the only thing they have in common are the female characters. Also why the leave out one of the girls in the hentai?!?!
